text: Davide Bottone (born 11 April 1986 in Biella, Italy) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a Midfielder. He is currently playing for Serie B team Varese.I lilla si rilanciano con Davide Bottone‚ legnanonews.com, 10 December 2017 Bottone was loaned to Biellese in summer 2006 but returned to Turin on 31 January 2007. He made his U21 debut in a friendly game against Germany on November 2008. ==Honours== ===Player=== * CFR Cluj ** Liga I - winner (2010) ** Romanian Cup - Winner (2010) ==References== == External links == * * * Davide Bottone's profile on figc.it * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Italian expatriate footballers Category:Varese Calcio players Category:Torino F.C. players Category:L.R.
